subs.text: @brettglass @davewiner The other secret of Twitter is to have a list that is your Karass. I follow a couple thousand people -- all generally interesting. I have fewer than a hundred on my list, all people who I want to stay connected with it and whose ideas I don't want to miss.
subs.rawText: @brettglass @davewiner The other secret of Twitter is to have a list that is your Karass. I follow a couple thousand people -- all generally interesting. I have fewer than a hundred on my list, all people who I want to stay connected with it and whose ideas I don't want to miss.

subs.text: @joshtpm Back in the days of Vietnam and the Underground Press, everyone knew that the Times was the voice of the Establishment. Judith Miller should have been a reminder.

subs.text: @OccamShaveCream @emptywheel The Times is a business, not a non-profit organization. It depends on Republicans to advertise in it and, likely in the medium term future, not close it down. That’s why it is devoted to not offending Republicans  with loud proclamations of the truth of sho they are.
